key_risks: Regulatory and legal challenges including FTC action and securities lawsuits
Ethical concerns regarding product accuracy and false positives
Privacy issues related to AI and data analytics in security screening
Intense competition from established and emerging security screening companies
Evolving regulations on data privacy, AI ethics, and security standards
controversies: FTC action for false claims about product capabilities
Multiple class action lawsuits alleging securities fraud
social_issues: Privacy concerns in public spaces due to AI and data analytics
Potential false positives undermining trust in sensitive environments
governance_issues: Potential reputational damage from ongoing legal battles
